fullText:
Simple Precision

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: 11th level, monk
Benefit: Whenever you hit with a monk at-will attack power or a melee basic attack, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls for the attack techniques of your monk at-will attack powers until the end of your next turn.

Published in Player's Handbook 3, page(s) 189.
name: Simple Precision
benefit: Whenever you hit with a monk at-will attack power or a melee basic attack, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls for the attack techniques of your monk at-will attack powers until the end of your next turn.
